title: New York Cannabis - The Catalyst People Aren't Talking About
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Weedmaps (MAPS) CEO Chris Beals appeared on Seeking Alpha earlier this year and joined me recently at Benzinga's Cannabis Capital Conference. We discussed scaling a cannabis marketplace, the arduous task of policing the platform, whether brand loyalty really exists and the catalyst that people aren't talking about.
